actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Edgin makes two Reinforced Lute or Shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Reinforced Lute
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10 damage) thunder damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10 damage) thunder damage.

actions.name: Disorienting Words
entries: Edgin magically taunts up to three creatures he can see within 60 feet of himself. Each creature must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6 damage) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the start of Edgin's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Edgin casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):
